songs.title: Faqeer
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Adha Peer Faqeer, Adha Rind Sharabi
Na Mera "Ra", Rah Meri Jehri Marzi Khuda Di
Meinu Apneya Ne Luteya
Rab Ne Bana Ke Es Duniya Ch Sutteah

Koi Kave Duniya Ch Qadr Ni Pyar Di
Koi Kave Ve Duniya Khusiyan Mere Yaar Di
Vakhri Kahani, Har Kise Di Zabani
Hun Rut Ve Toofani, Par Umeed Ve Bahaar Di

Koi Kave Duniya Ve Rab Di Awaaz
Koi Kave Ve Duniya Ton Rab Ve Naraaz, Meri, Ikko Hi Aas Rab Sun Le Awaaz
Sache Yaaran Da Saath Bhave Din Ho Ya Raat

[Verse 2]
Uchiyan Gallan Sochaan
Akhri Mein Ansoo Pochaan
Mathe Ton Paseena, Meinu Miliyan Haseena
Nale Maar Sona Chandi
(Zindagi Maharaajeyan Di, Duniya Deewani)

Mere Yaaran Ne Bhang Piche Gharaa'n De Ugaani, Meinu Rok Ke Dikhao
Khud Mere Ton Sikho, Meinu Dassan Nu Aao
CD khareedo Hun Yaaran Nu Sunao
Waddi Gaddiyan Chalao, Bass Khol Ke Vajao...

Par Mokah Jadon Mile, Duniya De Meleyan Ton Ho Jao Velle
Odo Socho Ek Gal
Pehla Massle Banauna Fir, Massleyan Da Hal
Sache Yaaran Da Saath, Jhoote Yaaran Da Qatal

[Verse 3]
Ethe Cash Hai Te Aish, Saare Paise De Pujaari
Paai-Paai Ve Jind Mein Batorde Guzari
Mein Vi Duniya Ch Aya, Mein Na Duniya Banayi
Raas Na Ayi Meinu Duniya Duhai

Hun Botlan Sharaab Diyan Sadkan Te Dol
Jind Aaye-Jaye Piche Rehn Yaadan Loki Bola
Rab, Sun Le Tu Sariyan Hun Aaftaan Utha Le
Lagda Ni Dil Meinu Wapas Bula Le!

Ve Lagda Ni Dil Meinu Wapas Bula Le!
Lagda Ni Dil Mera Wapas Bula Le!
Lagda Ni Dil Meinu Wapas Bula Le!
